label: Product Strategy
description: Comprehensive product development and go-to-market strategy for Q1 2025. This document outlines our core initiatives, team structure, and key deliverables.

children.label: User Research
children.description: Deep dive into user behavior, needs, and pain points through qualitative and quantitative research methods.

children.label: User Interviews
children.description: Conduct 30+ user interviews with existing customers to understand their workflow and identify improvement opportunities.

children.label: Quantitative Surveys
children.description: Deploy surveys to 5000+ users to validate hypotheses from qualitative research with statistical significance.

children.label: Analytics Review
children.description: Analyze existing product analytics to identify usage patterns, drop-off points, and feature adoption rates.

children.label: Design System
children.description: Build a comprehensive design system that ensures consistency across all product touchpoints and accelerates development.

children.label: Component Library
children.description: Create reusable UI components following atomic design principles. Includes buttons, forms, cards, navigation, and complex patterns.

children.label: Atomic Elements
children.description: Base-level components like buttons, inputs, labels, and icons that form the foundation of the design system.

children.label: Molecules
children.description: Combinations of atoms forming functional UI units like search bars, form groups, and card headers.

children.label: Design Tokens
children.description: Define colors, typography, spacing, shadows, and animation values as reusable tokens for consistent theming.

children.label: Development
children.description: Technical implementation of features and infrastructure improvements. Focus on performance, scalability, and developer experience.

children.label: Frontend
children.description: Client-side development using modern React patterns, state management, and performance optimization techniques.

children.label: Backend
children.description: Server-side APIs, database optimization, and infrastructure scaling to support growing user base.

children.label: DevOps
children.description: CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, alerting, and infrastructure as code for reliable deployments.

children.label: Go-to-Market
children.description: Marketing, sales enablement, and launch strategy to maximize impact and reach target audience effectively.

children.label: Content Strategy
children.description: Blog posts, case studies, documentation, and video content to educate and attract users.

children.label: Partnerships
children.description: Strategic partnerships with complementary products and industry leaders for cross-promotion.
